circuit_id.name: circuit_id
circuit_id.description: The circuit_id of the circuit to have the CLR generated for.
circuit_id.validation_error_text: Parameter circuit_id only accepts integer numbers.

raw.name: raw
raw.description: Generate flow rule view of the circuit for every node.
raw.validation_error_text: Parameter raw only accepts either 0 or 1 for false or true values, respectively.

name: generate_clr
description: generates a human readable Circuit Layout Record describing the given circuit.
